has research problem.from sentence: Improved Semantic Representations From Tree - Structured Long Short - Term Memory Networks

has research problem: predicting the semantic relatedness of two sentences

has research problem.from sentence: Tree - LSTMs outperform all existing systems and strong LSTM baselines on two tasks : predicting the semantic relatedness of two sentences ( Sem Eval 2014 , Task 1 ) and sentiment classification ( Stanford Sentiment Treebank ) .
